name: Inyoka yezulu (Rainbow Serpent)
shortLoreBlurb: Inyoka yezulu (Rainbow Serpent) is a spirit/serpent from Zulu/Xhosa associated with rainbows, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
overlapsLinks: Indra (Vedic), Manann√°n (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Perun (Slavic), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Thor (Norse), Yemaya (Yoruba), Zeus (Greek)
description: Inyoka yezulu (Rainbow Serpent) is a spirit/serpent from Zulu/Xhosa associated with rainbows, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
